name: Recipe: Stone Harbor Delicacies
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Stone Harbor Delicacies.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Violetgrass
customize.desc: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

customize.name: Matsutake
customize.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

customize.name: Stone Harbor Delicacies
customize.desc: Wok-fried vegetarian food. A stir-fried selection of three ingredients hailing from Liyue. Though the methodology is simple, it brings out the intense, innate flavors of the ingredients, and does not fade in brilliance when compared to some high-class delicacy.

value.text: Purchase from Licai at Liuli Pavilion in Liyue Harbor
